paper_abstract: This paper concerns the existence of antiperiodic solution for the linear mild (strict) dissipative evolution equation. A Yoshizawa type theorem is proved by the modular degree theorem. Further, application to the semilinear mild (strict) dissipative evolution equation is also given. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Antiperiodic solutions for dissipative evolution equations
